name: Dropdownmenu
body:
This is a fun project by me to try making a dropdown menu. Why? I find it very fancy, and last time before CSS was universal, my friend helped me to make it (I cannot remember using what). I really want to try making it by myself. Below is the dropdown menu.

Well, It's not pretty or anything. I just tried to make the dropdown menu works. :) Get the files from the original repo for clean code (rather than inspect the element of this page).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
